resources.string: You are about to begin a quiz that will test your knowledge on the topic titled above.
This is a timed quiz. Upon starting, you will have %d minutes to complete the quiz.

You will have a set number of points per question, to allocate between the available answers. If you are unsure of which is correct, you should allocate more points to the answer(s) based on your confidence in that answer being correct.
You may submit without finishing. However, it is highly recommended that you allocate all points available, even if you must guess.
Upon submitting, you will wait for further direction from your instructor.
